LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.bonded_animal_di: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.colonist_died.de: Помер один з наших. Ми повинні мати змогу піклуватися про своїх людей.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.justified_ex: Винний поселенець був страчений. Це було виправдано, але все одно сумно.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_eut: Поселенець був евтаназований. Це гуманно, але все одно сумно.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_exe: Поселенця холоднокровно вбили. Це здалося трохи злим.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.colonist_org: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.justified_execu: Винний в'язень чи гість був страчений. Це було виправдано, але все одно сумно.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_was_eut: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_was_exe: В'язня чи гостя холоднокровно вбили. Це здалося трохи злим.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.someone_was_org: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.innocent: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.MyAuntDied.stages.my_aunt_died.label: my aunt {0} died
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.my_brother_died.des: Мій брат помер. Моя плоть і кров...
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.my_cousin_died.label: my cousin {0} died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.my_cousin_died.descr: My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.my_daughter_died.d: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.my_father_died.label: my father {0} died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.my_father_died.descr: My father died. He's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.my_fiance_died.label: my fiance {0} died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.my_fiance_died.descr: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.my_fiance_died.desc: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.my_grandchild_di: My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.my_halfsibling_: My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.my_husband_died.des: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.my_kin_died.label: my kin {0} died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.my_lover_died.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.my_lover_died.descrip: My lover died. I am so alone.
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.my_mother_died.label: my mother {0} died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.my_mother_died.descr: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.my_nephew_died.label: my nephew {0} died
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.my_nephew_died.descr: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.my_niece_died.label: my niece {0} died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.my_niece_died.descrip: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.my_sister_died.label: my sister {0} died
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.my_sister_died.descr: My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.my_son_died.label: my son {0} died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.my_son_died.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyUncleDied.stages.my_uncle_died.label: my uncle {0} died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.my_wife_died.label: my wife {0} died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.my_wife_died.descripti: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.my_rival_d: Serves them right. At least there's some justice in this world.
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.my_friend: Such a wonderful person, gone forever. The universe gets darker every day.
